attributes.title: Absolutely awful
attributes.review: Why is this even an app?? I downloaded this because I wanted information on Trump, but every time I open the app, it’s just a super zoomed in pictures of Trump’s wrinkly orange skin. Also it took forever to download! I waited for at least a week before the app was functional. Total waste of time, really shows you that the Trump administration doesn’t care about anyone

attributes.title: App is trash like that Cheeto
attributes.review: I tried downloading it but when I opened this app, it froze my whole screen. I had to send my phone to a local phone technician in order to get it fixed. Not only is this app the worst app ever , this app also forced me to pay 80 dollars to fix the frozen screen. This app is futile and dangerous just like the rusty, wrinkly Cheeto dictator-like president who is corrupt and is a tyrant. Anyway, Stan Loona✨✨💋💕.

attributes.title: Orange Scary Man
attributes.review: So I downloaded this app hoping to stay up to date with our LoVeLy totally NoN racist president, and wasn’t too happy with the outcome!💕✨ Right as I downloaded it, an orange scary man appeared at my front door!🍤😡🟠 Cheeto man started chanting “BeAnS bEaNs BeAnS”. Then little lizard ninjas came to attack me and I was horrified!🦎😱 Then PeAcHeS appeared and started yelling “WHO IN THE HELL PUT THE MUFFINS IN THA FREEZA”. Then Charli Damelio appeared and peaches started to fight her. It was very scary.🥳💕👴🏿🍤🧚🥢🙈 Anyways, the bottom line is, horrible app!!

attributes.title: App rate-
attributes.review: Worst app ever!! I kept seeing pigs and oranges. IDK WHY😤. Also his pictures are not good angles🙄 he needs filter💗. When I opened the app there was cockroach’s but it’s okay I told them to look at a picture of trump and sum died and the others left😍ty trump!. Anyways 🙈have a good day (not really) Annoymous 2020🧚🏽😍✨ get this Cheeto out the office 🙄🧚🏽✨ anyways black lives matter 👁👅👁. “Blue lives matter “ is a joke. Your not born blue it’s just a uniform🐛

attributes.title: messed up my phone!
attributes.review: i downloaded the app it already made me mad bc it took almost an hour to download and it wouldn’t let me go on any other app until it was downloaded and every time i would open the app random pictures from my phone would be deleted. It changed my apple id password and deleted my playlists from my apple music.

attributes.title: Tried switching perspectives, didn’t work
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see as to why people want to vote for Donald trump. I tried to educate myself in the things he has done for this country, but unfortunately I could not find anything but him repeatedly shaming joe Biden rather than bringing good news to the app. I find that insanely immature which led me to give this one star. I will not be voting for him this year.

attributes.title: Don’t Download
attributes.review:
This app made my phone glitch so many times 🤬😡 and to top it off I think the app gave my number to telemarketers since I keep on getting spam called. All I wanted to be was a good citizen by supporting and trying to re-elect our Best president yet 🤡, but I guess that’s asking for too much. 
Also this is a message to our president 
~ You made my year (worse) 🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: This app completely shut down my phone. It took forever to download and completely glitched upon opening it. I had to restart my phone because it was frozen, but my phone wouldn’t turn on again. When it finally did all that opened was the app. I could be wrong but I think our president is trying to hack my phone.

attributes.title: My Life Will Never Be The Same
attributes.review: I was so excited when I got this app but as soon as I opened It, It turned everything on my phone ORANGE! So now when I use my phone my fingers turn orange, like after eating a bag of cheetos! I really wanted to love this app for the great pedo-sident himself, but I cannot. I feel like I got the ICE experience instead of the presidential treatment. I feel trapped in a cage instead of liberated in the fascist- - - i meant GREAT USA.

attributes.title: Save Tik Tok🤧🤧😪
attributes.review: Anyways I downloaded the app and first thing I see is our president with his gorgeous hair✨👩‍🦰that can barely hang on to his head and Cheeto skin🍑🥰but then I find out it gave me a virus   😡🦠but of course it couldn’t have been our presidents fault it was probably those beans that are stealing our jobs🤮🤢also disappointed that he didn’t build the wall🧱🚫anyways, in conclusion frick trump Abolish ICE and Defund the police✊🏻✊🏼✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿
